name: Comfort Food (Cynthia)
description:
Comfort Food: a bite-sized kinetic short story about breakfast and two long lost friends.

"There has never been a sadness that can't be cured by breakfast food."
- Ron Swanson, Parks and Recreation

Runs for 15-20 minutes.
Comfort Food is an isolated story made for Friendship Jam 2019.

Follow on twitter: https://twitter.com/mythridate
